name: Time City (EllaBella2964)
description:
Humanity has been injected with a futuristic chip that can control them. The 3 heroes of this story are sent out on a dangerous mission that messes with time travel. However, their mission was not a success, and they crash-land a month back in time. When they landed, the chip they had injected in them was damaged and no longer worked, therefore making them deceases on the eyes of the overlord that's controlling them. The futuristic space station they came from is high up in the sky and imposable to reach from the ground. It's up to you and our 3 heroes to save the world, using the abilities of the heroes together will help you adventure through the world. Your goal is to find a way back up to the station to warn our heroes past selves of the dangerous mission in hopes of preventing history repeating itself. Throughout your journey you will uncover more about the overlord and discover a dark secret about their world. Can you help our heroes save the world? 

Notice

This is a prototype game and some features mentioned could not be included. For example, the initial idea was for you the play to be able to control 3 different characters and switch between them. There are also some smaller features that could not be included. I hope you enjoy this prototype level and i would love some feedback. Thanks you.
